title: Test Your Markdown Here
description: A showcase of all the advanced Markdown features available on this blog, including lightboxes, admonitions, and math rendering. This post demonstrates every advanced markdown feature available on this blog. It's designed to be a long, scrollable document to test the progress bar functionality and showcase all rendering capabilities.

title: The Other Day I Explored the Dark Net
description: A brief introduction to the concepts and technologies behind the Dark Net. The way anonymity was engineered there changed how I think about building systems. We donâ€™t build tech like that anymore.

title: Third Time's the Charm
description: A post about the process of iteration and improvement in software engineering. In this comprehensive guide, we'll explore how to build robust, scalable backend systems using Node.js and TypeScript. We'll cover everything from project setup to advanced patterns and deployment strategies.

title: The Art of Simplicity in Code
description: Initial thoughts and ideas on building a personal portfolio and blog. Markdown is intended to be as easy-to-read and easy-to-write as is feasible. Reality? Even Easier.
